item.title: Helm join strings in a named template
item.description: Key benefits of Helm is that it helps reduce the amount of configuration a user needs to provide to deploy applications to Kubernetes. With Helm, we can have a single chart that can deploy all the microservices. Problem: Create a unique service account for each microservice, so all microservices don’t share same service account.
